trans-unit.source: To use map services in apps for Windows Phone 8.1 and earlier, you need a map service application ID and a token to include in your app's code.
trans-unit.target: To use map services in apps for Windows Phone 8.1 and earlier, you need a map service application ID and a token to include in your app's code.

trans-unit.source: You can get this token in the Dev Center dashboard on the Maps page in the Services section.
trans-unit.target: You can get this token in the Dev Center dashboard on the Maps page in the Services section.

trans-unit.source: To use map services in apps for Windows Phone 8.1 and earlier, you need a map service application ID and a token to include in your app's code.
trans-unit.target: To use map services in apps for Windows Phone 8.1 and earlier, you need a map service application ID and a token to include in your app's code.

trans-unit.source: You can get this token in the Dev Center dashboard on the **Maps** page in the **Services** section.
trans-unit.target: You can get this token in the Dev Center dashboard on the **Maps** page in the **Services** section.

trans-unit.source: **Note** To use map services in apps targeting other operating systems, visit the [Bing Maps Dev Center](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=614880).
trans-unit.target: **Note** To use map services in apps targeting other operating systems, visit the [Bing Maps Dev Center](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=614880).

trans-unit.source: See [Request a maps authentication key](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt219694) for more info.
trans-unit.target: See [Request a maps authentication key](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt219694) for more info.

trans-unit.source: Once you've [reserved your app's name](create-your-app-by-reserving-a-name.md), look for the **Services** section in the left navigation menu and expand it to show the **Maps** page.
trans-unit.target: Once you've [reserved your app's name](create-your-app-by-reserving-a-name.md), look for the **Services** section in the left navigation menu and expand it to show the **Maps** page.

trans-unit.source: When you click **Get token**, the **ApplicationID** and **AuthenticationToken** will be generated and will appear on this page.
trans-unit.target: When you click **Get token**, the **ApplicationID** and **AuthenticationToken** will be generated and will appear on this page.

trans-unit.source: **Note** You don’t have to finish submitting your app at this time.
trans-unit.target: **Note** You don’t have to finish submitting your app at this time.

trans-unit.source: After you request a token and ID, this info will be saved on this page.
trans-unit.target: After you request a token and ID, this info will be saved on this page.

trans-unit.source: You can return to this page at any time to access this info.
trans-unit.target: You can return to this page at any time to access this info.

trans-unit.source: You'll also need to make sure to add the **ApplicationID** and **AuthenticationToken** to your code before you package and submit your app.
trans-unit.target: You'll also need to make sure to add the **ApplicationID** and **AuthenticationToken** to your code before you package and submit your app.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [How to add a Map control to a page (Windows Phone 8.1)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=614882).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [How to add a Map control to a page (Windows Phone 8.1)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=614882).
